metadata.description: Complete Q&A pairs from question sequence deconstruction examples for norm-text translation analysis

examples.title: User Account Creation
examples.original_norm_text: Create a user account with email and password. The account has admin privileges and is active by default.

qa_pairs.natural_answer: Create a user account with email and password.

qa_pairs.natural_question: Given it is done by the method, then it makes what happen?
qa_pairs.natural_answer: The account has admin privileges and is active by default.
